DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will evaluate modality, efficacy and safety of Avastin (bevacizumab) as first-line treatment in combination with chemotherapy in patients with inoperable advanced, metastatic or recurrent non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer in clinical practice. Data will be collected for each patient for 18 months from initiation of Avastin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Chemotherapy in Patients With Metastatic or Recurrent Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age Inoperable advanced, metastatic or recurrent nonsquamous nonsmall cell lung cancer (NSCLC) Treating physician's decision to initiate firstline Avastin treatment Participation in a clinical trial evaluating anticancer therapies
